gameDetails.name: Railway Boom
gameDetails.description:
Players take on the role of one of the great industrialists of the Meiji, Taishō and Shōwa eras. To gain fame, you’ll need to manage 4 types of Resources.
Spend Money to build lots of rail lines

Use your Materials to gain better trains

Invest Science in acquiring useful development cards

Maintain your trains with Coal to prevent them from falling into disrepair.

Plan your actions with this in mind and strive to become the best railway company!

—description from the designer
